# url

**Instance Property**

The URL identifying the file from which the scene source was created.

## Declaration

```swift
var url: URL? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is `nil` if the scene source was not created using the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneSource/sceneSourceWithURL:options:] or [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneSource/init(url:options:)] method.

## Getting Information about the Scene

- **data**: The data object from which the scene source loads scene content.
- **property(forKey:)**: Returns metadata about the scene.
